DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine rate absorption Ibuprofen Paracetamol formulation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : > 18 < 50 year . 2 . Sex : Male female subject eligible entry . 3 . Female subject child bear potential negative pregnancy test screen visit willing use effective method contraception , applicable 4 . Female subject nonchild bearing potential negative pregnancy test screen visit . 5 . Male subject willing use effective method contraception . 6 . Status : Healthy volunteer body mass index > 18 < 30 kg/m2 . 7 . Absence relevant abnormality clinical examination , ECG , drug safety analysis . 8 . Subjects give write informed consent 1 . Pregnant lactate female subject . 2 . A history significant disease bodysystem . 3 . Any condition may currently interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug . 4 . A history allergy intolerance ( include angiooedema , urticaria , bronchospasm rhinitis ) relate treatment ibuprofen , aspirin nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , paracetamol , excipients formulation . 5 . A history peptic duodenal ulcer gastrointestinal bleed upper gastrointestinal bleed , significant gastrointestinal disorder . 6 . A history frequent dyspepsia , e.g. , heartburn indigestion . 7 . A history migraine . 8 . A history psychotic illness , attempt suicide parasuicide . 9 . Current smoker exsmokers smoke within 6 month . 10 . A history drug abuse ( include alcohol ) . 11 . High consumption stimulate drink 12 . Those positive drug abuse screen include alcohol occasion throughout study . 13 . Ingestion prescribe drug time 14 day dose study medication ( exclude hormonal contraceptive hormone replacement therapy ) , consumption enzyme inhibitor inducer previous month ( barbiturate , carbamazepine , erythromycin , phenytoin , etc ) . 14 . Ingestion overthecounter preparation within 7 day dose study medication , include herbal medication , vitamin/fish oil supplement , ibuprofen NSAIDs paracetamol . 15 . Donation blood quantity previous 12 week enrolment study 16 . Known human immune deficiency virus ( HIV ) positive status , positive viral serology screen . 17 . Topical use ibuprofen within 7 day dose study medication 18 . Those previously randomise study . 19 . Employee study site . 20 . Partner first degree relative investigator . 21 . Those ibuprofen level > 10 ng/ml determine prestudy screen visit 2 ( Part 2 ( Pivotal Phase ) study ) . 22 . Those unwilling consume gelatin animal origin ( Part 2 ( Pivotal Phase ) study ) . 23 . Those participated clinical trial previous 12 week 24 . Those unable opinion Investigator comply fully study requirement .
